title: Locus News: A Smart News Aggregator
about: A news aggregator that uses the Naive Bayes Classification Algorithm to categorize and deliver news based on set user preferences.

title: Should I Hike Today?
about: An app that renders a response based on Wunderground's API data for a given National Park. Lets you know whether or not conditions are ideal for a hike.

title: Houser: Property Management Made Simple
about: An app that allows for an admit to post and modify available home listings as well as allow for users to view and filter listings by type, price, or size.
